1.content:
Welcome to the Bovine Academy, a co-ed academy focused on promoting the values of cuisine and cooking. It is one of the highest ranked academies this side of New York, with a large campus. The college is actually divided into four main sections: first divided by gender, and then the lower classmen, aged 13 to 17, are seperated from the upperclassmen, aged 18 to 24. Every student is specifically educated in the numerous fields of cuisine, from foreign dishes to baking to even barbequing. Due to its selective nature of choosing students, however, the school only consists of 500 students, and 80% of the school population is, for whatever reason, female.

Naturally, however, our story cannot focus on the statistics this school has to offer. So choose one of the five main characters we will see this story from.

1) Izumi Hayabasha
Age - 18
Height - 5' 4"
Weight - 105 lbs
A new transfer here, she is eager to learn from her professors in order to become a master chief, owning her own restaurant in the future. She's an endearing young girl, always optimistic and willing to try out new things. However, at the same time, she's uncomfortable with herself due to her lesbianism.

2) Christine Phillips
Age - 15
Height - 5' 8"
Weight - 140
A longtime student here, Christine has grown jaded about this school, but remains here due to her parents. She hates the weight she's gained since applying, and constantly prays she can leave this school and become a nurse like she always wanted.

3) Bella Clearwater
Age - 21
Height - 5' 6"
Weight - 200
A girl who has gained a considerable amount of weight in her time at Bovine, she takes great pleasure in fattening up the underclassmen. Her secret fetishes have grown stronger as she aged, and now she has a goal: to fatten 5 girls up so that they're bigger than she is!

4) Mallery Tetaglia
Age - 14
Height - 5' 0"
Weight - 160
Chubby from a young age, Mallery didn't mind the weight she packed on her first year, but now seems allured by it her second year. She is curious how much weight she can put on, and is also curious in the bodies of her fellow students.

5) Miss Grace Beatrice
Age - 28
Height - 5' 10"
Weight - 323
A former graduate, Miss Beatrice has returned to the school to ensure that the students receive the most out of their time here. Naturally, that specifically means she wants them to put on as much weight as possible, and, additionally, wishes to taste all of their cooking.

Now choose! Who's story do you want to follow?
1.title: Welcome to Bovine!

choices: "Go see a friend of mine with me?"
11.content:
"Get it together, Yoko. Just get it together."

As she ascended the stairway, her eyes lowered as she fumbled around in the pocket of her blue cardigan, searching for her room's keys, she asked herself, momentarily, why she was so fidgity. After all, this was the moment she had been waiting for past four years to arrive. It was the day she began her first term at the Bovine Academy, one of the top ranking culinary schools in the East Coast. Surely her parents had wanted her to look elsewhere due to the high price of the school, but Yoko had won through with her rather selfish request to be accepted into the school. She supposed her anxiety was just butterflies in her belly, though, and nothing more.

Nothing genuine, anyway.

She had noticed, on the way up, a large quantity of pudgy students. It was surprising for her to see so many. She had never even gained an ounce more than necessary in her teenage years, and most of her friends here relatively slender as well. Maybe it was just the area she had lived in. After all, a majority of the country was obese, so why did she find it so surprising to see so many chubbettes waltzing around the school?

Finally, she found her key, and unlocked the door.

"Anyone here?" Yoko asked, curiously as she locked the door behind her.

"Who's that?" a female voice called.

"Uh, my name's Yoko. Yoko Hayabasha. If you're who I think you are, I'm kinda your new room mate. Uh, where are you?" Yoko walked into the main room, an area furnished with sketchbooks and several posters of Japanese anime. She felt it gave the room an interesting flare, but seemed a bit surreal. In her bags, she had also packed a few anime posters herself. She figured they'd at least have stuff to talk about together.

"Oh, there you are." Yoko turned around to see her roommate. She was taken aback at first, not so much out of repulsion but out of surprise. She was a relatively big girl, a bit taller than she was, but also much wider. She wasn't a pig, that's for sure, but she was much larger than any of the girls Yoko had ever spoken to personally (although she had seen bigger in this academy since arrival). She had a large belly that bulged out of the girl's tank top, which was pulled snuggly around her skin. It even dug into the blubber around her shoulders. Her breasts hung like small melons, albeit small ones, and rested comfortably over her jiggling tummy. Her thighs, which were partially hidden by her capris, were thick and lush, and her calves were no different. Her arms, though, were most peculiar. For some reason, Yoko had a thing for people's arms. The fact that she couldn't see any muscle tone, that the arm was so thick and jiggly, that she couldn't even make out the girl's wrists under all that lush flub, was something that made Yoko, for a moment, loose herself to momentary lust--

Oh! Snap out of it!

"Yoko, right?" the girl, who Yoko noticed was caucassian, asked, "My name's Katlyn Ovadia, but you can just call me Kat."

"Oh, okay," Yoko replied, nodding with a broad smile on her face.

Kat stretched her arms up, pulling her shirt up a bit so her lushious belly was exposed for a moment or two. It was smooth, no stretch marks to speak of. Yoko must've been staring at it, as Kat asked, mildly, "You looking at my flab?"

"Huh?! Oh, uh, no, it's not that at all," Yoko stammered, blushing deep red.

Kat giggled, "It's okay. You just look like such a stick, you know. How much do you weigh, anyway? 90 lbs?"

"Oh, no, I'm not that skinny," Yoko laughed back, "No, I'm like, what, 105? Something like that."

"Oh, okay, then I'm only twice your weight, then," Kat replied, "For a second I was worried."

"Oh, you're 210?" Yoko asked.

"Yeah, but don't worry! It's just because I've been here since I was 13," Kat replied.

"What do you mean by that?"

"Oh, I just needed to learn a little self-control is all," Kat replied, shrugging her pudgy shoulders, "No big deal. Say, Yoko, do you wanna--"
11.title: Yoko's Arrival

111.content: Um all right I guess I need to put some meat on my bones to fit in?
111.title: "Go down to dinner?"

choices: "I don't know, I don't think I can..."
112.content:
"Oh, talk? Don't see why not. About what?"

"Well, what kind of stuff are you into, that sort of stuff. That way we'll be able to find something to talk about so we don't drive each other crazy," Kat replied.

"Well, I noticed you had a few posters up," Yoko replied.

Kat suddenly drew herself inward, her eyes narrowing with a dark glint of distrust. "Yeah, what about them? I love anime. I'm not gonna hide it. Are you one of those people who think it's just tentacles and hentai and--" Kat silenced herself as Yoko withdrew the posters she had held inside of her own bag, and her anxious frown was replaced with a broad smile. "Oh! I'm sorry, I'm just used to people badmouthing anime! Thank God you like it too!"

"Yeah, I really am such a geek," Yoko replied, "Can you help me put them up?"

"It would be a pleasure! What posters do you have?"

"Oh, just shows like Fruits Basket, Evangelion, Elfen Lied, shows like that," Yoko said.

"You ever see Real Drive?"

"Never even heard of it."

They spent the rest of the afternoon putting up posters. Halfway through the session, Kat withdrew several bags of tortilla chips along with some salsa. Yoko was surprised to see, after finishing up with the posters, that the entire bag, that had been full at the beginning of the session, was now in a trash can, crumbled up and empty.

"Wow, I can't believe we ate all that," Yoko stammered.

"What do you mean? There were two of us eatin' it. It wasn't that big of a bag," Kat replied.

"Well, you're probably used to eating a lot, but usually it took a whole group of me and my friends to eat one of those things," Yoko replied, surprised. She placed a hand on her stomach absentmindedly, unsurprised to feel minor nausia spring up inside of her.

"Feeling sick?" Kat asked, mildly concerned for her roommate.

"Oh, nothing big," Yoko replied, "Just too much junk too soon, I guess."

"Oh, you'll get used to it." Kat grinned nonchalantly as Yoko tried to understand just what Kat meant by "You'll get used to it."

"Hey, are you into cosplay?" Kat asked, curiously.

"Oh? Uh, I've never cosplayed before, but I wouldn't mind to one day. Just out of curiosity, why do you ask?"

"There's a con coming up in a couple of months. I'm wondering if you wanna come along with me. A couple other friends of mine are going too, and I don't want to leave my roommate out. I mean, I might actually get to like you in the meantime. I'm just asking now because I'm buying the tickets tonight."

"Oh! I woull pay for my tickets! You don't need to worry about! And I'll take care of my costume!"

"So that's a yes?"

"Uh, well..."
112.title: You Like Anime too?

13.content:
Bella Clearwater was strolling through the corridors at Bovine academy, one of the country's most prestigious culinary academies. Bella then met up with her friends, fellow prodigy chefs.

"Hey Bella." greeted a busty redhead and a fat raven haired girl.

"Hey girls, eyeing the new girls." Bella inquired.

"Yep" the two answered.

The trio gazed upon the new girls particularly their still slim figures. Each of them smirked knowing well of the weight the new girls will gain. Their assumptions weren't untested for each of them had fattened up along with nearly every other woman in this academy. It was sights like this that made the upperclassmen reminisce about past times. An upperclassmen, Bella has been attending Bovine for many years. Bella had enrolled when she was 13 years old, as an eager young thin girl obsessed with cooking, from experimenting with dishes, baking cakes, whipping up treats, roasting succulent meats, working all day preparing a sumptuous feast and reveling in the satisfaction of perfecting a dish. However during her stay at Bovine the thin girl had blossomed into a corpulent chef. It certainly wasn't uncommon though, from all the taste testings, samplings, and high class food that was served, it wasn't too questionable that the girls would put on some weight.

"Yes, I bet these girls will fatten up nicely." Bella remarked in a somewhat lascivious manner.

"It almost sounds like you enjoy watching girls get fat, Bella." the raven haired girl commented.

"I just think that it's interesting watching weight build up on a girl." Bella retorted.

"I know what you mean, I always love watching the before/after pictures of women that change their weights." concurred the busty redhead.

Bella smiled as she imagined the skinny girls passing by as waddling fat girls. Swaying her butt side to side in lechery, her friends couldn't help but notice.

"Umm Bella... you seem to be getting yourself steamed up." a sentence that her friends spoke fairly often.

"Hey you should know how excited I get, since I'm a..." Bella replied
13.title: Bella

choices: there's so many to choose from
131.content:
"A gorgeous beauty." Bella boasted.

But this was not mere boasting for Bella was stunning. Bella had long blonde hair, enticing eyes, smooth skin, curves, and huge beasts which she proudly flaunted. She would waltz through the academy with her bouncing jugs and long cleavage on display for all to see. One would think that she'd be nothing more than eye candy but this breathtaking spectacle could cook, thus becoming the envy of many girls. Bella confidently strutted her curvacious figure everyday exhibiting her huge boobs, her large belly, thick legs, squishy arms, and impressive buttocks. As Bella developed at Bovine she acquired a love for her growing body. Watching her thin body plump up aroused her causing her to abandon restraint and welcome the accumulating pudge. However it wasn't just her own weight gain that caught her attention. Bella was highly enticed by watching other girls pack on weight or even better intentionally fatten them up herself.

Bella would use her popularity to ensnare skinny vulnerable girls in her fattening trap. She would then feed them loads of her cooking under the guise of taste testings, gifts, or feeding her everything in the fridge to make room for an assignment. Bella savored the rolls that emerged on the thin girls, fondling the new fat as it formed on the girls. By the time the girls were nice and fat, a new set of thin girls would arrive and Bella would restart the process again with the fresh meat. Each time Bella becoming better.

"So you see any girls you like?" asked on of the friends.

"Giggle There's just so many." Bella giggled.
131.title: gorgeous beauty

1311.content:
Then one girl caught her eye. She was a particularly petite lass, slender waist, trim legs, firm butt, perky tits, overall a perfectly emaciated figure, ideal for someone of Bella's carnal cravings to prey upon. The girl had a brown ponytail, smooth skin, green eyes, and a face displaying a nervous optimism (not an uncommon trait for young students in this academy). Bella narrowed her eyes and licked her lips, a sign that this petite girl would be her next play thing.

"Oh there she goes again." said the well endowed redhead.

"Yep that girl's waistline is in certain danger. Though she'd still gain weight even without Bella's relentless assistance. Every girl here ends up gaining some weight I mean look at me I was once a slim 120 pounds now I'm 190pounds." stated the fat raven haired girl.

"Yeah it does happen to everyone." admitted the busty redhead gazing down at her plump paunch which was once a tone midriff.

Meanwhile the petite brown haired girl noticed the 200 pound Bella saunter towards her. Observing her huge breasts bounce in her taut top which lied upon a large content belly, accompanied by her exposed chunky thighs which she flaunted through her short skirt. This intrepid woman showed no humility with her flab, an attribute this fresh girl had yet to develop. With her hand gracefully sliding through her long silky hair, Bella approached the new 'meat.'

"Yoohoo!" Bella cued.

"Um me?" questioned the lowerclass girl.

"Of course sweety, who else would I be talking to?" Bella seductively teased.

The skinny girl was overwhelmed by the stunning upperclassmen focusing on her. It would be intimidating for a young new student to be receive attention from a ostensibly charismatic lady. Bella was fully aware of her prey's nervous uncertainty, she had experienced it before with previous girls she had fattened. A new girl in a new academy being approached by a gorgeous older girl bearing affection would always feel a sense of insecurity. But Bella knew how to coddle the girl into friendship, earning their trust, and smothering them in luscious fat. This girl was about to experience the same treatment.

"So what's your name cutey?" inquired Bella.

"Leslie" finding courage, the girl mustered.

"Leslie huh so how you liking Bovine Academy?" Bella asked breaking down Leslie's defense.

"Oh its great they got all sorts of fancy kitchen equipment." Leslie responded.

"You like cooking too." Bella guessed.

"Oh yeah! I've loved cooking since I was a little girl. I just love it." Leslie professed though looking at her scrawny figure one would suspect that she'd didn't eat much of her work.

"Awesome! we should totally taste each other's cooking!" Bella suggested.

"Yea..sure" Leslie answered still feeling a slight intimidation.

"Great you and me are going to be buddies." Bella wrapped her thick arm around Leslie "So if one of us ever needs help on an assignment we can ask each other to help, right?"

"Y-yeah sure." Leslie growing more confident, accepted the notion.

"Great how about later we hang out?" suggested a scheming Bella.

"Sure!" replied Leslie feeling an ecstatic enthusiasm becoming friends with such a beautiful upperclassman.

As the two went off to their classes, Bella noticed another skinny girl whose body begged to be layered in copious amounts of lard.

"Why should I only limit myself to one girl?" Bella reasoned "Why I could fatten up an entire group of girls." The thought aroused Bella who was drifting towards the next girl.
1311.title: Bella sees a promising girl

13112.content:
As Bella initiated her target Bella was unexpectedly halted by a fat girl.

"Hey Bella!" greeted the enthusiastic overweight girl.

"Oh hey." Bella responded to the jolly girl.
13112.title: a fat girl approaches her

131121.content:
With just a mere glance, Bella instantly remembered the girl. She was a underclassman on her second year at Bovine Academy who had underwent Bella's treatment the prior year. "Oh hey Gwen." Bella greeted. "Bella I made your signature brownies." rejoiced Gwen as she aptly shoved one in Bella's face. "Mmm wow you did master my recipe." remarked an impressed Bella. "Yup it took tons of attempts but I finally made them." prided the fat Gwen. "Yes I see you've been giving it your all." Bella said eyeing her engorged belly spilling over her skirt. The sight of the girl's gelatinous stomach, stirred up Bella's memory of her relationship with this girl.

It was one year ago, when Gwen was a fresh newbie to Bovine Academy. Gwen was a light weight 110 pound introverted girl. She was shy and reluctant to socialize. Bella saw this and pounced upon the vulnerable girl. Bella invited the insecure girl to her dorm for dinner. At first Gwen resisted but Bella knew how to break down a girl's defense. Being such a thin girl, Gwen was unaccustomed to fat girls especially confident ones like Bella. Using her expertise, Bella concocted a dish possessing a tantalizing scent. It only took one bite for Gwen's tastebuds to burst in elation. Bella smiled as Gwen feverishly scarfed down her cooking. Upon finishing her meal, Gwen was offered brownies. The immeasureable deliciousness graced Gwen's tongue overwhelming her resistance. As Gwen began gorging on the brownies displaying no restraint, Bella knew that this girl was addicted. From then on Gwen made daily visits to Bella who provided fattening foods. Bella gleefully watched Gwen growing fatter everyday. By the end of the year Gwen was twice her size and no longer a modest girl roamed the school grounds showing her protruding gut without a care.

Bella smiled as she recalled Gwen's gain, who much to Bella's joy had put on even more weight. Gwen offered Bella more brownies which she happily consumed.
131121.title: one of her previous gainers

info.brief_description: When learning to perfect recipees and the like, often waistlines expand...
info.description:
Hello, and welcome! ^_^ If you are reading this, congrats! You're an FA who clearly is into this thing. If not, get out.

Anyway, if you are reading this, you need to know a few things. The story is about girls at a culinary school and their experiences. Now, you aren't limited to just describing their weight gain, although it is incouraged you include it throughout. However, there are a few subjects that cannot be mentioned, and they are as follows:

1) No death! Please, we don't want dead teens all around the story.
2) No rape! Sex is only good in this story when it's of-screen.
3) Keep the gains realistic. No one gains 10 pounds over the course of an hour. You make them gain a lot of weight over an extended period of time, so if you want them to get huge, make sure you have some time skips throughout, okay?
4) Lesbians are perfectly fine. Since the focus is on women, though, gay men aren't entirley encouraged, but you can include them if you want.
5) Keep male wg to a minimum.
6) Try to make each chapter substantial and weighty. A paragraph isn't good enough. Try for at least three or four paragraphs, alright? Move the story forward, please!

All in all, just have fun with this. ^_^ Thanks for readin', and please add on to this! I can't do this alone!
